About.title: About LastBot
About.description: LastBot is an AI-driven startup operating in Finland and the United States, specializing in reliable and impactful customer communication solutions. Founded in 2023 by Pasi Vuorio and Tero Heinonen, we focus on using artificial intelligence to help businesses reduce costs and improve their operations.

founder.title: Meet Our Co-founder
founder.name: Pasi Vuorio
founder.bio: Hey, I'm Pasi Vuorio, co-founder of LastBot and a longtime AI solutions architect. I've spent the last two years fully immersed in AI and language models, working to create innovative solutions that transform how businesses communicate and operate.

Services.title: AI Training Services
Services.description: Expert-led training in AI development and implementation by Pasi Vuorio, who has trained hundreds of developers across Finland's leading tech companies.

aiDevelopment.title: AI-Assisted Development Training
aiDevelopment.description: Learn how to effectively use AI tools in your development workflow. From code generation to pair programming with AI, master the techniques that will boost your productivity.
aiDevelopment.clients: Trusted by leading companies like Siili Solutions, Reaktor, and Hellon

generativeAI.title: Generative AI Fundamentals
generativeAI.description: Comprehensive training on generative AI technologies, including large language models, image generation, and practical applications in business contexts.
generativeAI.focus: Understanding capabilities, limitations, and real-world use cases

promptEngineering.title: Prompt Engineering Mastery
promptEngineering.description: Master the art of crafting effective prompts for AI models. Learn advanced techniques for controlling AI outputs and achieving consistent results.
promptEngineering.practical: Hands-on exercises with real business scenarios

trainer.title: About the Trainer
trainer.description: Pasi Vuorio is a recognized AI expert who has trained hundreds of developers across Finland. His practical approach combines deep technical knowledge with real-world business applications.
trainer.experience: Extensive experience in AI solutions architecture and implementation

Contact.title: Get in Touch
Contact.description: Have questions about how LastBot can help your business? Visit our website or send us an email to learn more.
